mapper.insert: insert into team(teamId, teamName, firstBase, secondBase, thirdBase, catcher, pitcher, leftFielder, rightFielder, centerFielder, shortStop) values(#{teamId}, #{teamName}, #{firstBase}, #{secondBase}, #{thirdBase}, #{catcher}, #{pitcher}, #{leftFielder}, #{rightFielder}, #{centerFielder}, #{shortStop});
mapper.update: update user set teamName = #{teamName} where id = #{teamId};

update team set teamName = #{teamName}, firstBase = #{firstBase}, secondBase = #{secondBase}, thirdBase = #{thirdBase}, catcher = #{catcher}, pitcher = #{pitcher}, leftFielder = #{leftFielder}, rightFielder = #{rightFielder}, centerFielder = #{centerFielder}, shortStop = #{shortStop} where teamId = #{teamId};
mapper.select: select count(*) from team where teamName = #{teamName};
